intro: Psilogramme rotundifolia, commonly known as the round-leafed psilogramme, is a species of flowering plant in the family Apiaceae. It is characterized by its small, round leaves and clusters of small, yellowish-white flowers. Native to southern Africa, this plant typically grows in grassy areas and along stream banks. It has a slender, branched stem and produces small, dry fruits. The plant is often used in traditional medicine for its purported health benefits.
